There is not yet a clear answer on how genetics influences sexual orientation. Some studies have suggested a correlation between genetics and sexual orientation, particularly for male homosexuality, but more research is needed to fully understand the complex interplay of genetic and environmental factors that influence sexual orientation. It is important to note that sexual orientation is multifaceted and not solely determined by genetic factors.
